title: Itsuka Subete ga Kimi no Chikara ni Naru
description:
The story of a man who runs at the forefront of the voice acting industry ― manga adaptation of the book written by the voice actor, Kaji Yuki ― Itsuka Subete ga Kimi no Chikara ni Naru. 

The book tells the story of the troubles he shared back in his early days, and how they now form his passion towards this occupation of “voice acting.” A toast to all who are working towards their dreams! What does it mean to hold a dream? And what do we do to make it a reality?
